name: Air Controller
description:
In this game you play as the air traffic controller for a small airport.

You are scored by your ability to direct the air traffic on ACCURACY and ability to stick to the schedule.

You are given a flight schedule to complete. It can

 be viewed in detail by clicking the SCHEDULE button

You may direct aircraft to a gate by clicking on the aircraft (selecting it) and then clicking on a gate (in the box). An aircraft may not be moved between gates.

A gate's flag may be activated. When a flag is activated a plane parked there will attempt to take off in the next half hour (on the half hour, xx:00 or xx:30)

Good Luck!
